RKhC7vAYxgALkJIv.name: Benefit
RKhC7vAYxgALkJIv.description: Effect: Choose one of the following benefits:

system.story: I said you had twenty-four hours to leave town. That was … what, about twenty-four hours ago?

prerequisites.value: You join an organization that hunts criminals, such as the Far Mariners (see Orden and the Timescape in Chapter 1: The Basics), or you are deputized to act for the local authorities.
